Introduction of M/s. Excellent Services

Name of the Firm: M/s. Excellent Services Legal Status of the Firm: Sole Proprietorship Proprietor of the Firm: Mr. Tariq Hussain Malik â€¢ Nature of Business: Consultancy and Construction Established Since: 1999 National Tax Number: 1738442-7 KCCI Membership Number: 59503 Number of Employees: 25 Employees Bankers of the Firm: Habib Metropolitan Bank Limited United Bank Limited Auditors of the Firm: Ansari Associates

EXCELLENT SERVICES FOR CNG / PETROL PUMP / LPG BUSINESS SOLUTIONS

We provide following solutions for CNG / LPG / Petrol Pump stations:

Getting provisional license from OGRA. Getting NOCs from concerned Govt. department. (Civil Defence/TMO/MPGO/KBCA/Explosive/SITE Ltd/SSGC/KESC. ) Finalization of CNG compressor/equipment. Financial agreements (loan/lease Facility) from banks. (Financing and Leasing) Getting gas and electricity connections. completion of site map and civil works. Installation of CNG equipments. Third Party Inspection by concerned Govt. Departments. Commissioning/commencement of commercial operations. Availability of Spares, Services and training. Possibility of partnership.

If you have any one of above issues to be solved, Please do not hesitate to contact us any time.

0321-9251379 / 0300-9251379

Construction Services:

Excellent Services started Construction in 1985. It is one of the leading players in Real Estate marketing in Karachi, Pakistan. We are anchored in the financial hub of Pakistan, and well connected with the real estate investor and developer community here. Our globalize approach through our vast international experience in construction and housing gives us the edge in providing the best to anyone who cherishes comfort and class in their home and living environment.

Real Estate:

Our Mission Simplifying the complex property buying and selling process in Pakistan Recommending the right resources to help you reach your goals in finding property or selling a property. Helping you negotiate the best possible deals for your home buying or selling. Managing the buying and selling process to help achieve your goals with ease and convenience Offering you outstanding service and personal expertise in the field of Real Estate in Pakistan Providing you with quality real estate resources and financial services for investment in Pakistan Real Estate.

Consultancy for Dangerous Chemicals / Petroleum Products /Chemical storage License.

EXCELLENT SERVICES

I feel great pleasure to introduce our company M/s. Excellent Services to you as we are CNG / Petrol pump / LPG consultants, Constructors, Real Estate marketing services provider in Pakistan. We are Registered with Karachi Chamber of Commerce & Industry. Registration No.59503 & N.T.N # 1738442-7. We have been working since 1999 doing business of consultancy and construction established M/s. Excellent services as a sole proprietorship firm in 1999. (M/s. Malik Enterprises & M/s. Excellent Services). We are providing consultancy for the license of non-bulk Dangerous Chemicals / Petroleum Products /Chemical storage.

We arrange all N.O.C from the different departments like D.C.O, T.M.O,Civil defence Anti narcotic force, environment and protection agency, DIG etcâ€¦..proposed plan for Storage of chemicals.

Form â€œMâ€ For Individuals and Oil Companies for Storage of Petroleum Products and Chemicals in non-bulk storage in storage godowns.
